issues.title: Transmission Hesitation
issues.description: Some owners report hesitation when accelerating from a stop, particularly in the 8-speed automatic transmission.
issues.commonFix: Software update from dealer, transmission fluid change

issues.title: Dashboard Rattle
issues.description: Rattling noise from the dashboard area, especially on rough roads.
issues.commonFix: Dealer can apply foam padding behind dashboard panels

issues.title: Fuel Pump Recall
issues.description: Fuel pump impeller may deform, causing engine stalling.
issues.commonFix: Free fuel pump replacement under recall

issues.title: Unintended Acceleration Reports
issues.description: Some RAV4 Prime and Hybrid owners report brief unintended acceleration surges.

issues.title: AC Condenser Failure
issues.description: AC condenser prone to developing leaks from road debris due to thin construction.
issues.commonFix: Replace AC condenser, often covered under extended warranty

issues.title: Oil Dilution (1.5T)
issues.description: 1.5L turbo engine can experience oil dilution from fuel in cold climates.
issues.commonFix: More frequent oil changes, software update

issues.title: Oil Dilution (1.5T)
issues.description: 1.5L turbo engine prone to fuel mixing with oil, especially in cold weather short trips.

issues.title: Infotainment Freezing
issues.description: Touchscreen may freeze or become unresponsive, requiring vehicle restart.

issues.title: 10-Speed Transmission Shift Issues
issues.description: Harsh shifting, clunking, or hesitation in the 10R80 10-speed automatic.
issues.commonFix: Adaptive learning reset, transmission software update

issues.title: Cam Phaser Tick
issues.description: Ticking noise on cold start from cam phaser wear in 5.0L V8.

issues.title: AFM/DFM Lifter Failure
issues.description: Active Fuel Management / Dynamic Fuel Management lifter collapse causing misfires.

issues.title: Transmission Shudder
issues.description: Torque converter shudder in 8-speed automatic, especially at low speeds.
issues.commonFix: Transmission fluid flush, torque converter replacement

issues.title: B48 Timing Chain
issues.description: Early timing chain stretch in B48 2.0L turbo engines with high mileage.

issues.title: iDrive Software Glitches
issues.description: Intermittent iDrive screen freezes, Bluetooth connectivity issues.

issues.title: Panel Gap Inconsistency
issues.description: Uneven panel gaps between body panels, varying quality control.

issues.title: Suspension Noise
issues.description: Clunking or squeaking from front suspension over bumps.
issues.commonFix: Control arm bushing or ball joint replacement

issues.title: Phantom Braking
issues.description: Unexpected automatic braking on highways, especially with vision-only Autopilot.

issues.title: Heat Pump Failures
issues.description: Heat pump may fail in extreme cold, resulting in reduced heating and range.

issues.title: Rear Seat Belt Alert
issues.description: False rear seat belt unbuckled alerts, especially with items on rear seats.

issues.title: Engine Seizure (Theta II)
issues.description: Theta II engine prone to connecting rod bearing failure, causing engine seizure.

issues.title: CVT Hesitation
issues.description: Lineartronic CVT may exhibit hesitation, juddering, or delayed response.
issues.commonFix: CVT software update, valve body replacement

issues.title: Windshield Cracking
issues.description: Higher-than-normal rate of spontaneous windshield cracking.

issues.title: Death Wobble
issues.description: Violent front-end shaking at highway speeds, often after hitting a bump.
issues.commonFix: Steering stabilizer upgrade, track bar replacement

issues.title: eTorque Mild Hybrid Issues
issues.description: eTorque system may cause start-stop hesitation or battery drain.

issues.title: Dashboard Reflection
issues.description: Dashboard reflection on windshield in bright sunlight conditions.

issues.title: Oil Leak at Oil Filter Housing
issues.description: Oil leak from oil filter housing gasket on 3.8L V6.

issues.title: Air Suspension Failure (C43/C63)
issues.description: AIRMATIC suspension struts may develop leaks, especially in cold climates.

issues.title: 48V System Glitches
issues.description: EQ Boost 48V mild hybrid system may throw error codes or cause restart-stop issues.
